description: Buffer overflow in Cisco WebEx Recording Format (WRF) player T27 LD before SP32 EP16, T27 L10N before SP32_ORION111, and T28 before T28.8 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted DHT index value in JPEG data within a WRF file, aka Bug ID CSCuc24503.
